title: 720: BLOOMBERG FORSEES BITCOIN RALLYING TO $400K THIS YEAR!! 5 COUNTRIES TO LEGALIZE BTC IN 2022!!
description:
It may sound like a pretty outlandish claim for anyone to assert that the Bitcoin price could hit $400,000 before the end of the year. But when such a claim comes from a reputable analytics firm, it is worth paying attention to it.

Analysts at Bloomberg Crypto in a monthly report have predicted that BTC could soar up to new highs of $400,000 this year in 2021.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
